001.comments: If registration for this class is blocked, then it is full and you should register on the corresponding waitlist. Students will be periodically moved from the waitlist into the class as seats become available, and notified of their registration via email.

01W.comments: VISA 240 01W is a waiting list for VISA 240 001. Students will be moved from the waiting list into the course, space permitting, in order of registration date.While we hope all interested students will obtain a seat in this class, please be aware that being in the waiting list does not guarantee you will obtain a seat in the class.

description: Introduction to photography techniques and image-making. Emphasis on camera techniques and film and darkroom production. Only one of VISA 240 or VISA 241 may be used toward requirements for Major, Minor, or Honours programs in Visual Art.
